structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.text: The cabinet may compel obedience to its lawful orders by mandamus, injunction, or other proper proceedings in the Franklin Circuit Court or any other Circuit Court of competent jurisdiction. Every order entered by the cabinet shall continue in force until the expiration of the time, if any, named by the cabinet in the order, or until revoked or modified.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 371, sec. 43, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 512, Part 7, sec. 29, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1980.
